timeline.message:
[miio] Support Vacuum specific options

addressing #6628
closes #6630

* Create dynamic channels based on detected capabilities
* Improve status updates in case of missing values

* Implemented capabilities:
	- water_box_status
	- water_box_carriage_status

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] add additional dynamic channels

* Waterbox mode
* lockenabled
* Mop forbidden

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] add zone cleaning command

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] remove room # once roomclean has been initated

remove room # once roomclean has been initated
Send only valid room nrs

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] improvements after feedback

Fix channel
Improve channel description

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] fix xml format

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.body: please put static fields above non-static fields
timeline.bodyText: please put static fields above non-static fields
timeline.bodyHTML: please put static fields above non-static fields
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
case CHARGING:
control = "dock";
break;
case CHARGING_ERROR:
control = "dock";
break;
case DOCKING:
control = "dock";
break;
case FULL:
control = "dock";
break;
case IDLE:
control = "pause";
break;
case PAUSED:
control = "pause";
break;
case RETURNING:
control = "dock";
break;
case SLEEPING:
control = "pause";
break;
case SPOTCLEAN:
control = "spot";
vacuum = OnOffType.ON;
break;
case CHARGING:
case CHARGING_ERROR:
case DOCKING:
case FULL:
case RETURNING:
control = "dock";
break;
case IDLE:
case PAUSED:
case SLEEPING:
control = "pause";
break;
case SPOTCLEAN:
control = "spot";
vacuum = OnOffType.ON;
break;
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyHTML:
One of the few times that streams improves readability.

Suggested change
for (Channel ch : thing.getChannels()) {
logger.debug("Channel :{}, Channeltype UID: {}", ch.getUID(), ch.getChannelTypeUID());
if (ch.getUID().getId().equalsIgnoreCase(capability.getChannel())) {
logger.debug("Channel already available...skip creation of channel '{}'.",
capability.getChannel());
deviceCapabilities.replace(capability, true);
channelfound = true;
break;
}
}
if (channelfound) {
break;
}
if(thing.getChannels().stream()
.anyMatch(ch -> ch.getUID().getId().equalsIgnoreCase(capability.getChannel()))) {
logger.debug("Channel already available...skip creation of channel '{}'.",
capability.getChannel());
deviceCapabilities.replace(capability, true);
continue;
}

Also, I think you intended to continue instead of break in your initial code.
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.message:
[miio] update with review suggestions

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>
